flavorText:
"There's more than one way to skin an Ouphe—or thwart a mage."
—Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

foreignData.name: Seelenschranke
foreignData.text: Wenn der Gegner Deiner Wahl einen Beschwörungszauber spricht, fügt ihm die Seelenschranke 2 Schadenspunkte zu. Dieser Spieler kann 2 zahlen, um diesen Schaden zu verhindern.

name: Soul Barrier
originalText: Whenever target opponent casts a summon spell, Soul Barrier deals 2 damage to him or her. That player may pay o2 to prevent this damage.

rulings.text: A “creature spell” is any spell with the type Creature, even if it has other types such as Artifact or Enchantment. Older cards of type Summon are also Creature spells.

text: Whenever an opponent casts a creature spell, Soul Barrier deals 2 damage to that player unless they pay {2}.
